Match Moments

Source: R/match-moments.R
ssd_match_moments.Rd

Gets a named list of the values that produce the moment values (meanlog and sdlog) by distribution and term.

Usage

ssd_match_moments(
  dists = ssd_dists_bcanz(),
  meanlog = 1,
  sdlog = 1,
  nsim = 1e+05
)

Arguments

dists

A character vector of the distribution names.

meanlog

The mean on the log scale.

sdlog

The standard deviation on the log scale.

nsim

A positive whole number of the number of simulations to generate.

Value

a named list of the values that produce the moment values by distribution and term.

See also

estimates.fitdists(), ssd_hc() and ssd_plot_cdf()

Examples

moments <- ssd_match_moments()
print(moments)
#> $gamma
#>    shape    scale 
#> 1.479687 2.589063 
#> 
#> $lgumbel
#> locationlog    scalelog 
#>    0.534375    0.762500 
#> 
#> $llogis
#> locationlog    scalelog 
#>     0.96875     0.52500 
#> 
#> $lnorm
#>   meanlog     sdlog 
#> 0.9812500 0.9515625 
#> 
#> $lnorm_lnorm
#>  meanlog1    sdlog1  meanlog2    sdlog2      pmix 
#> 0.1409856 1.0659456 1.1849856 0.9799296 0.1487680 
#> 
#> $weibull
#>    shape    scale 
#> 1.352319 4.502075 
#> 
ssd_hc(moments)
#> # A tibble: 6 × 9
#>   dist        proportion   est    se   lcl   ucl    wt nboot pboot
#>   <chr>            <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <dbl> <int> <dbl>
#> 1 gamma             0.05 0.439    NA    NA    NA     1     0    NA
#> 2 lgumbel           0.05 0.739    NA    NA    NA     1     0    NA
#> 3 llogis            0.05 0.562    NA    NA    NA     1     0    NA
#> 4 lnorm             0.05 0.558    NA    NA    NA     1     0    NA
#> 5 lnorm_lnorm       0.05 0.469    NA    NA    NA     1     0    NA
#> 6 weibull           0.05 0.501    NA    NA    NA     1     0    NA
ssd_plot_cdf(moments)
